name: .SIDB File Extension
summary: Learn about .SIDB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data file used by iTunes, a multimedia playback application; saves authorization information for the computer so that the user can play purchased songs for his or her user account; similar to .SIDN and .SIDD files; not meant to be opened manually by the user.

content: SIDB files are saved to the following directory in Windows 7 and 8:
C:\​Documents and Settings\​All Users\​Application Data\​Apple Computer\​iTunes\​SC Info\​

NOTE: If iTunes will not open after you have recently installed a new version in Windows, you can delete the SC Info.sidb file along with the SC Info.sidd and SC Info.sidn files in the directories listed above, restart your computer, and then reopen iTunes.
